com.pavlovmedia.oss.osgi.http

Interface PavlovHttpClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PavlovHttpClientImpl

    public interface PavlovHttpClient
    A modern take on an HTTP client
    Author:
    Shawn Dempsay <sdempsay@pavlovmedia.com>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PavlovHttpClient addHeader(String name, String value)
      Adds a single header to the request
      PavlovHttpClient againstUrl(URL url)
      Sets the base URL to work against
      PavlovHttpClient asSse(java.util.function.Consumer<SseMessageEvent> sseConsumer)
      Treats this connection as SSE and will dispatch events to the provided consumer.
      PavlovHttpClient asStreaming(java.util.function.Consumer<InputStream> streamConsumer)
      Treats this connection as a stream and hands the input stream off once connected to the streamConsumer Note: Can't be used with asSse(Consumer)
      PavlovHttpClient beforeConnectRaw(java.util.function.Consumer<HttpURLConnection> rawConnection)
      Gives a chance to directly modify the connection before it is used
      PavlovHttpClient beforeFinishRaw(java.util.function.Consumer<HttpURLConnection> rawConnection)
      Give a chance to directly inspect the connection results before return
      PavlovHttpClient clone()
      Returns a complete clone of this object configuration
      Optional<HttpResponse> execute(java.util.function.Consumer<Exception> onError)
      Executes this request synchronously, sending along any errors to the onError handler, and only returning a response if there are no errors
      CompletableFuture<HttpResponse> executeAsync()
      Executes this request asynchronously.
      CompletableFuture<HttpResponse> executeAsync(ExecutorService pool)
      Executes this request asynchronously using the specified pool.
      PavlovHttpClient ignoringSelfSignedCert(boolean b)
      Allows you to ingore self signed certificates
      PavlovHttpClient usingGzip()
      Attempts to get this stream with gzip encoding
      PavlovHttpClient withAcceptTypes(String... acceptTypes)
      Sets acceptable return types
      PavlovHttpClient withBasicAuth(String username, String password)
      Adds an authorization header with basic auth
      PavlovHttpClient withContentType(String contentType)
      Sets the content type of this request
      PavlovHttpClient withData(java.util.function.Consumer<OutputStream> handleStream)
      Adds data passed into the stream (cannot be used with withData(String))
      PavlovHttpClient withData(String data)
      Specifies a string to be used as data (cannot be used with withData(Consumer))
      PavlovHttpClient withHeaders(java.util.function.Consumer<Map<String,List<String>>> setHeaders)
      Allows a modification of the headers
      PavlovHttpClient withInterrupt(AtomicBoolean interrupt)
      Passes in a sentinel that if set to true will stop any long-running processing and stop the request with an InterruptedException
      PavlovHttpClient withQueryParameter(String key, String value)
      Adds a query parameter to url
      PavlovHttpClient withSimpleHeaders(java.util.function.Consumer<Map<String,String>> setHeaders)
      Allows a modification of the headers
      PavlovHttpClient withUrlPath(String path)
      Appends a path to the end of the URL provided by againstUrl
      PavlovHttpClient withVerb(HttpVerbs verb)
      Sets the verb to use

      • executeAsync

        CompletableFuture<HttpResponse> executeAsync()
        Executes this request asynchronously. Any exceptions will be fed through the CompletableFuture.exceptionally(java.util.function.Function) method.

      • executeAsync

        pool -
